content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'xtraverse': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The groove orientation is horizontal in the image (X-axis in the camera frame).

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
